New Records: Axar Patel scored 65 runs off 31 balls for India in the 2nd T20I
Key Match Events: India's top order collapsed, being reduced to 39 for 4 in the powerplay
Axar Patel and Suryakumar Yadav staged a fightback, adding 91 runs off 40 balls for the sixth wicket
Dasun Shanaka took two wickets and gave away four runs in the final over to help Sri Lanka win by 16 runs
Pre-Game Insights: India won the toss and decided to bowl first to avoid fielding in the dew later on
Post-Match Reflections: Sri Lanka's Dasun Shanaka praised Axar Patel's fantastic knock after the match
Miscellaneous Highlights: Arshdeep Singh bowled five no-balls, which changed the complexion of the game
Sri Lanka's Kusal Mendis and Dasun Shanaka were their top-scorers with 52 and 56* off 22 respectively
India's Axar Patel and Suryakumar Yadav brought up 91 runs off 40 balls for the sixth wicket
